To find out more about the Clubcard Boost
My Boosts at Tesco
If you exchange your vouchers on the Clubcard website for Boost eCodes at Tesco, your eCodes will be displayed on this page.
Good news! Clubcard Boost at Tesco is now on.

With Clubcard Boost your vouchers can be worth double when you spend them at Tesco in selected departments, either in store or online. Here’s the place to see what’s going on with Boost tokens you bought online.
Please allow one hour for your order to be processed. Remember, you won’t be able to view expired Boost tokens or Boost tokens purchased in store.
Want to know more about what your vouchers could be worth? Read more about Clubcard Boost
Enter the Boost token codes listed below at the online checkout
Please note Boost token codes can only be used once.
Copy the Boost token codes
Your Boost token codes
These are the Boost token codes you ordered to spend online. See your email to check where you can spend them if you are not sure.
Only Boost token codes purchased online will be shown here.
To use your Boost token codes online:
Get rewards
Print my tokens
To print your Clubcard Boost tokens
Please select tokens and try again. Thank you
Date ordered
Select the Clubcard Boost tokens to print
Print your Clubcard Boost tokens to use in store
Expiry date
Please ensure your Clubcard Boost tokens have printed clearly on white paper, before taking into store. Unfortunately, smudged or unclear barcodes are unable to be scanned at the till.

Clubcard Boost tokens will be accepted printed in black & white or in colour. If you are worried your printout might not be clear enough, try printing it our again, (Clubcard Boost tokens can be printed more than once), or write down the 22 digit barcode number that is next to the barcode and take this into store with your printed Clubcard Boost tokens. If your barcode does not scan, checkout staff can type in the barcode number at the till to redeem your Clubcard Boost tokens.
Please note: Clubcard Boost tokens will display their original expiry date.
These are the Boost token you ordered to spend in store (but not at Tesco Direct desks). See your email to check where you can spend them if you are not sure.
Follow the instructions below to print your Clubcard Boost tokens to spend in store.
Any Clubcard Boost tokens ordered in store will not be listed below.
Please note: Clubcard Boost tokens can only be used once.
